name: Cashteroids
description:
Made over the weekend of Ludum Dare 44! Sell your ship’s hull for more upgrades and weapons! Learn how to balance your max health as well as the number of upgrades on your ship. As stages get more challenging, does it benefit you to have a decked-out arsenal, or would it be better to instead have the thiccest hull in the galaxy? Either decision you make, our sleazy alien shopkeep is more than happy to cut you a deal.

This is some hot garbage, but folks, it's got rough-around-the-edges charm.

L-Ctrl : Fire / Select
W: Forward Thrust
S: Reverse Thrust
A/D: Rotate Ship

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Code Monkeys and Witty Banter - Michael Racine, Griffin Tucker

Dirty Shopman and Outerspace Doodads - Drew Tucker

Audio - The Depths of Space
